hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e # Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
cd target
reset_role
aws s3 cp s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/a/stack_variables.tf .
export client_secret=`cat stack_variables.tf | grep -A3 picsure_client_secret | head -n 3 | tail -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 5 | sed 's/"//g'`
echo $client_secret > secret.txt
# This UUID is currently a magic number of sorts, this will need to be parameterized to make this job portable export new_token_introspection_token=`java -jar generateJwt.jar secret.txt sub "PSAMA_APPLICATION|8b5722c9-62fd-48d6-b0bf-4f67e53efb2b" 365 day | grep -v "Generating"`
export old_token_introspection_token=`cat stack_variables.tf | grep -A3 picsure_token_introspection_token | head -n 3 | tail -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 5 | sed 's/"//g'`
sed -i "s/$old_token_introspection_token/$new_token_introspection_token/g" stack_variables.tf
aws s3 cp stack_variables.tf s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/a/stack_variables.tf
mv stack_variables.tf stack_variables_a.tf
echo "New token:" echo "${new_token_introspection_token}" # only one stack at the moment #aws s3 cp s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/b/stack_variables.tf .
